name: Pocket Heroes
summary: Command a party of elite heroes, fight monsters and demons in various dungeons. Use magic and different weapons. Take vengeance for king Arthur's death in this Android game. Defeat strong monsters like cyclops, carnivorous plant, giant sandworm and so on. Organize your hero parties in such a way so their classes and abilities complement each other. You have mages warriors, archers and priests. As you level up you can choose one of two paths of each hero class.
